app.name: Bulk Proactive
app.short_description: Clones a sample ticket as a template to many users
app.long_description:
Provide the app with the ticket ID of the 
 ticket you would like to duplicate. Provide a list of user 
 IDs to be requesters. Configure what type of IDs to use from settings
app.installation_instructions:
Provide a list of ticket fields for the form 
 and you're off to the races

external_id.label:
Use users' external ids to verify?
 (ZD ids when unchecked)
